text:
-maqShTAka#pAlaqM nirva#pEqt tEja#skAmOq&gnimEqva tEja#svantaq(gg)q svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq sa EqvAsmiqn tEjO# dadhAti tEjaqsvyE#va Ba#vatyaqgnayE# sAhaqntyAya# purOqDASa#maqShTAka#pAlaqM nirva#pEqth sIkSha#mANOq &gnimEqva sA#haqntya(gg) svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq tEnaiqva sa#hatEq ya(gm) sIkSha#tE || 14 
(BrAtRu#vyasyA -smiqn - tEja#svatE purOqDaSa# - maqShTAtri(gm)#Sacca) (A3)
